transcript_en:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello? Hello?
Customer: Ji good evening, good afternoon.
Executive: Haan ji madam aapka call nahi lag raha shayad.
Customer: Hello? Aapka ji aapka. Maine aapko photos bhej diye the.
Executive: Main packing machine wala se bol raha hu ji.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Haan theek hai, main ek bari dekh leti hu.

upsell.upsell_reason: No clear indication of upsell opportunity

call_summary: The customer is checking on photos she sent related to packing machines. The executive confirms he is the packing machine contact.

key_insights: Customer is following up on previously sent photos.
The call seems to be a follow-up on a specific request.
